name: RSP Nutrition Prime-T 120 Caps
description:
RSP Nutrition Prime-T 120 Caps

Prime-T was created using the latest in scientific research to create the ideal formula for boosting natural testosterone levels. Potently doses, Prime-T offers the benefits of boosting both free and total testosterone levels. Additionally, Prime-T is formulated to act both as an estrogen against & DHT antagonist which means healthy estrogen balance and positively impacting prostate health. These health hormone levels are critical aspects for guys looking to build lean muscle, boost strength, and improve body composition in addition to supporting a healthy sex drive.

  • Naturally Supports Serum & Free Testosterone Levels.

name: RSP Nutrition BCAA 5000 Powder Post Workout and Muscle Recovery - 30 Servings
description:
RSP Nutrition BCAA 5000 , Lean Muscle Recovery - 30 Servings

Enhance Muscle Growth
BCAA supplementation paired with resistance training can lead to increased muscle protein synthesis and muscle growth.

Speed Up Recovery & Muscle Repair
BCAAs can reduce the breakdown of protein and muscle damage during exercise, thus protecting against muscle loss, decreasing soreness and speeding up muscle recovery.

Improve Athletic Performance
Supplementing with BCAAs as part of a resistance training program can result ion significant improvements in strength and performance.

Suggested Use

As a dietary supplement, take 1 scoop of BCAA 5000 Powder into 8-10 oz cold water, between meals, 30-45 minutes before workouts, and/or immediately after workouts. Consume 1 serving, 1-3 times daily.

Other Ingredients

Citric acid, maltodextrin, natural and artificial flavors, silica, sucralose, malic acid, acesulfame potassium, FD&C yellow #5, FD&C red #40.
short_description:
RSP Nutrition BCAA 5000 , Lean Muscle Recovery – 225 gms

  • Clean Active Nutrition
  • 5g Instantized BCAA
  • lean Muscle Growth
  • Athletic Performance
  • Recovery
  • Natural & Artificial Flavor

name: Labrada, Humano Growth, 120 Capsules
description:
Labrada Nutrition, Humano Growth, 120 Capsules

Product description

Growth Factor Formula. Boosts Testosterone and GH. Speeds Recovery. Humanogrowth is a powerful blend of pharmaceutically standardized extracts from fertilized chicken eggs and bio-active serum albumin. Each serving provides naturally occurring IGF-1, IGF-2, FGF (fibroblast growth factors), NGF (nerve growth factors), EGF (epidermal growth factors), CTGF (connective tissue growth factors), Immunoglobulins, Immune-Regulating Anti-Inflammatory Cytokines, and TGF-B (Transforming Growth Factor Beta). Increase Positive Nitrogen Balance by 20%. Increase Protein Efficiency by 31%. Reduce Inflammation by 6.5%. Naturally increase testosterone and growth hormone levels. Naturally decrease recovery time. Balance adrenal functions. Remains Biologically Active After Oral Adminstration. Humanofort: Embryonic Peptide Matrix Yielding Naturally Occurring IGF-1, IGF-2, FGF (fibroblast growth factors), NGF (nerve growth factors), EGF (epidermal growth factors), CTGF (connective tissue growth factors). Lean Muscle Accelerator: Biologically Active Plasma Albumin Peptides Yielding Naturally Occurring Immunoglobulins, IGF-1, Immune-Regulating Anti-Inflammatory Cytokines, and TGF-B (Transforming Growth Factor Beta)

name: Nueherbs True Vitamin (Multivitamins) 60 Capsules
description:
Nueherbs True Vitamin (Multivitamins) 60 Capsules

Neuherbs True-vitamin is designed by following the guidelines of ICMR (Indian Council of Medical Research) and the Codex Alimentarius Commission, keeping the micronutrient requirements in mind to contribute to the overall wellness of an individual. Neuherbs Multivitamin is a solution for today’s unhealthy habits of binging on fast food that only offers empty calories. We designed this 3 in 1 complete Formula of Multivitamin, Multimineral, and Multiherbs because we know that your body has unique needs to help nourish yourself. Health is the sum total of small efforts made to fulfill our daily nutritional needs.

“A journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step”,

Neuherbs multivitamin can be your first step to fulfill your daily requirement of micro-nutrients.Quality is the utmost priority. Our every batch is tested to make sure that the product you receive meets our standards, which we developed using government guidelines and scientific analysis. Our quality process works to ensure that you get exactly what is listed on our bottles.

We believe that the best way to deliver the healing wisdom of nature is through safe, effective, and high-quality products that are prepared using earth’s pure ingredients. Our products are made by balancing purity and safety to innovate something that is free from harmful additives, preservatives, artificial colors, flavors, added sugar, sodium and safe for human consumption by being allergen friendly.
